appendix.title: Further Information Sources
appendix.para: Developers wanting to get familiar with software development and implementation in JBoss Application Server can read: JBoss in Action: Configuring the JBoss Application Server. (Manning, 2009. Javid Jamae, Peter Johnson).
For more JBoss documentation related to JBoss Application Server 6 and its' underylying technologies, refer to the manuals available online at .

For the latest information on EJB 3.1 with thorough JBoss coverage see Enterprise JavaBeans 3.1, 6th Edition. (O'Reilly, 2010. Andrew Rubinger, Bill Burke, Richard Monson-Haefel). The book examples show how Java EE integration testing is made easier using Arquillian and ShrinkWrap, two breakthrough community projects simplifying Java EE integration testing.
To learn more about Hibernate, see Java Persistence With Hibernate. (Manning, 2007. Christian Bauer, Gavin King)
For complete coverage of the JBoss Seam framework, we recommend Seam in Action. (Manning, 2009. Dan Allen).
